condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: External Communication, Advocacy and Partnership.

description.narrative: In 2019, UNICEF CO intensified resource mobilization activities (two NatComs visited Guinea) and advocacy on education during the celebration of Child Month in Guinea with the commitment of the National Ambassador, and advocacy on immunization with the involvement of the first lady of Guinea, among other high-level advocacy activities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
